prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon with a fiery appearance and unique water abilities.
Show me a legendary creature that embodies both fire and water elements.
Design a massive Pokemon with a round, ring-like structure on its back.
Imagine a powerful creature that thrives in volcanic environments, combining steam and flames.
Make a Pokemon with a robust body and striking blue accents among its red scales.
Generate a dual-type monster that showcases both its fire and water attributes visually.
Give me a Pokemon that looks fierce yet majestic, perfect for a legendary status.
